entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023
